name: Dress Inc 3D - Fashion Master
description:
The game boasts a huge selection of garments - likely more than you've ever seen in a cosplay & fashion simulator

Make sure your dress up and makeup fashion styling is on point so you can build up a big client base.

Be seen! Go to fancy schmancy events with your clients and take pics for their Stylagram so they can show off your dress up and makeup style skills, in this fashion story game.
